function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious virus in construction sites","Impact":"Suspension of projects, labor impact, job loss, time overrun, cost overrun, and financial impact","Mitigation":"Reducing the number of workers on-site, encouraging offsite work, implementing health and safety protocols","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, remote work technology","People":"Construction workers, project stakeholders, workforce","Owner":"Project developers, contractors, policymakers"},{"Description":"Fluctuation of material price and shortage of materials and supply chains","Impact":"Legal issues, project delays, cost overrun, shortage of materials","Mitigation":"Diversifying supply chains, negotiating contracts, stockpiling critical materials","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, predictive analytics for material pricing","People":"Contractors, project developers, supply chain managers","Owner":"Contractors, supply chain managers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Shortage of workers in urgent medical facility projects","Impact":"Project delays, cost overrun, compromise on project quality","Mitigation":"Implementing safety measures to attract workers, providing incentives for workers, training new workers","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, training and onboarding software","People":"Project developers, medical facility stakeholders, workforce","Owner":"Project developers, medical facility stakeholders, policymakers"}]}
